com.iKairos.TrafficSim

Class Simulation.SimConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iKairos.TrafficSim.Simulation.SimConstants
  • Enclosing class:
    Simulation

    public static class Simulation.SimConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds globally accessible simulation constants.
    These are only the preferred constants. Each agent should be able to override these constants.
    Metric units are used. That is, distance is measured in meters, acceleration in meters per second squared, etc
    Author:
    Nimrod
